submission:
from collections import defaultdict
import math
class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        pos = {1: 1}
        res = 1 if 1 == k or k == 0 else 0
        add = 1
        for i in range(math.ceil(math.log2(k + 1) + 1)):
            new_pos = defaultdict(int)
            for x in pos:
                if x - 1 + add == k: res += 2 * pos[x]
                if x + add == k: res += pos[x]
                if x + add - 2 == k: res += pos[x]
                new_pos[x - 1 + add] += pos[x]
                new_pos[x + add] += pos[x]
            pos = new_pos
            add <<= 1
        return res
